description.value:
Requirements: Aberrant subtype.

The eidolon grows a thick mass of tentacles that can be used as a primary natural weapon. The tentacles deal 1d8 points of damage if the eidolon is Medium. Eidolons with the grab evolution that is linked to a tentacle mass can use that ability to grapple foes of up to the eidolonâ€™s size, and they can also use this evolution in place of the serpentine base form to qualify for the constrict evolution.
